modules.title: Introduction to Long-Term Investing
modules.description: Master the fundamentals of stock ownership and market mechanics

sessions.title: What is a Stock?
sessions.description: Learn what it means to own a piece of a company
keyPoints: A stock represents ownership in a real business
Shareholders have voting rights and profit participation
Companies issue stocks to raise capital for growth

sessions.title: What is the Stock Market?
sessions.description: Discover how the global marketplace for stocks operates
keyPoints: Stock exchanges connect buyers and sellers globally
Supply and demand drive price movements
Brokers facilitate trading between investors

sessions.title: The Power of Long-Term Investing
sessions.description: Unlock the magic of compound growth over time
keyPoints: Compound growth multiplies wealth exponentially
Time in market beats timing the market
Patience is the investor's greatest advantage

sessions.title: Why Invest in the Stock Market?
sessions.description: Build lasting wealth and secure your financial future
keyPoints: Stocks historically outperform other asset classes
Investing beats inflation and preserves purchasing power
Building wealth creates financial freedom and legacy

modules.title: Getting Started with Investing
modules.description: Set your foundation with goals, budgets, and brokerage selection

sessions.title: Setting Financial Goals
sessions.description: Define your investment objectives and timeline
keyPoints: SMART goals create clear investment direction
Different goals require different strategies
Regular review keeps you on track

sessions.title: Creating a Budget
sessions.description: Maximize your investing power with smart budgeting
keyPoints: The 50/30/20 rule for investment allocation
Automating investments for consistency
Emergency fund before investing

modules.title: Fundamental Analysis
modules.description: Master the art of analyzing company value and financial health

sessions.title: Introduction to Fundamental Analysis
sessions.description: Learn to evaluate companies like a pro investor
keyPoints: Fundamental analysis reveals true company value
Financial statements tell the complete story
Ratios help compare investment opportunities

sessions.title: Reading Financial Statements
sessions.description: Decode income statements, balance sheets, and cash flow
keyPoints: Income statement shows profitability trends
Balance sheet reveals financial strength
Cash flow statement shows real money movement
